{"id":844279597,"question_id":932,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1Â year, 7Â months","timestamp":1668567679,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"7 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/844279597/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Monotonic Array","memory":"92.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public boolean isMonotonic(int[] nums) {\n     \n        int len = nums.length;\n        if(len==1)\n            return true;\n\n        int isIncreasing = (nums[len-1]-nums[0]>0) ? 1 : (nums[len-1]-nums[0]==0)? 0 : -1;\n        \n        for(int i=1; i<len; i++){\n            \n            if(nums[i]-nums[i-1]==0)\n                 continue;\n            \n            if((nums[i]-nums[i-1]>0 && isIncreasing!=1))\n                return false;\n            \n            if((nums[i]-nums[i-1]<0 && isIncreasing!=-1))\n                return false;\n            \n        }\n        \n        return true;\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"monotonic-array","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
